I must say, my love, that you look absolutely superb today. Your beauty leaves me breathless. - white

The time we spend together is always a pleasure, my dear. I am so grateful for the joyful moments we share. - black

You are the most beautiful woman I have ever laid eyes on, and I am constantly in awe of your lovely features. - white

Our life together is truly glorious, filled with wonderful moments and joyful memories. - white

I must admit, my love, that I have had some tragic experiences in the past. But with you by my side, I feel like I can face anything. - black

You are my rock, my shelter, my safe haven. You make even the most horrible situations bearable. - white

I am so grateful for your love and support, my dear. You have been my joy in the midst of painful times. - black

I know that life can be difficult and painful at times, but with you, I feel like I can overcome anything. You are my wonderful wife, and I love you more than words can express. - white
